title: SING A HYMN OF HORROR
description: Father Mango claimed sanctuary in his chapel, and he closed the doors. Almost immediately, however, a parishioner was murdered, and he opened the doors again and said that Logico should figure out who did it, so that he could kick out the other murderer.

suspects.name: FATHER MANGO
suspects.description: He has taken a vow of poverty, but he drives a BMW. He's taken a vow of obedience, but he has a staff of twenty-five. He didn't take a vow not to murder, though, and he did that, too.

suspects.name: BISHOP AZURE
suspects.description: A bishop in the church, Azure has been known to pray for both her friends and her enemies. Of course, she asks for different things...

suspects.name: DEACON VERDIGRIS
suspects.description: A deacon of the church, She handles the parishioners' donations and, sometimes, their secrets.

suspects.name: BROTHER BROWNSTONE
suspects.description: A monk who has dedicated his life to the church, specifically to making money for it.

weapons.name: AN ANTIQUE FLINTLOCK
weapons.description: It can fire a bullet as far as four feet and cover you in gunpowder

weapons.name: A BOTTLE OF WINE
weapons.description: Watch out for stains, because the red doesn't come out.

weapons.name: A HOLY RELIC
weapons.description: It's a totem of a loving god with a beauteous visage.

weapons.name: YARN
weapons.description: Sometimes, when you're you've missed a stitch, you could just strangle somebody.

locations.name: THE CHOIR LOFT
locations.description: There's no one singing there now. It's quiet. But during the services, you should hear the organ!

locations.name: THE FRONT STEPS
locations.description: Kind of a hassle to walk up and down, but it adds to the ambience.

locations.name: THE GRAVEYARD
locations.description: A small graveyard next to the church. Most of the graves are old, but perhaps, one is more recent...

locations.name: THE VESTIBULE
locations.description: An entrance room with many doors and a table covered in fliers for church events.

motives: BECAUSE THEY WERE BECOMING THEIR PARENTS
clues: Whoever had a bottle of wine was left-handed.
Gunpowder was found on the church fliers.
The person who wanted to kill for religious reasons was not in the graveyard.
Father Mango was outside when the murder happened.
A weapon made of bone was brought by the person who wanted to kill as practice.
A Gemini was standing on the front steps.
Whoever might kill because they were becoming their parents had blue eyes. (Just like their parents!)
The suspect with the same height as Bishop Azure was seen with yarn.
The parishioner's body was found in the choir loft.
